TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SignOutCleanupRequestMessage extends System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage

Docs.summary: Represents a WS-Federation Sign-Out Cleanup message. The message is created when the received message has the action parameter (wa) set to "wsignoutcleanup1.0".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri baseUrl) cil managed

Docs.param: The base URL to which this message applies.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified base URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The wa message parameter (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage.Action%2A> property) is initialized to "wsignoutcleanup1.0".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri baseUrl, string reply) cil managed

Docs.param: The base URL to which this message applies.
The value of the wreply parameter. The URL to which the reply should be sent.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified base URL and wreply parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The wa message parameter (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationMessage.Action%2A> property) is initialized to "wsignoutcleanup1.0".

-or-

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the wreply parameter of the message.
Docs.value: The value of the wreply parameter. This is the URL to which the reply should be sent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Set to `null` or an empty string to remove the wreply parameter from the message.

Docs.exception: An attempt to set a value that is not a valid, absolute URI occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

Docs.exception: The wa parameter (the property) is not set to "wsignoutcleanup1.0".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(class System.IO.TextWriter writer) cil managed

Docs.param: The writer to which to write the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SignOutCleanupRequestMessage.Validate%2A> method before writing the message.
